name: Bay Harbor Butcher
description: Channel your inner Dark Passenger with this henley, cargo pants and boots. Complete with stylish watch and latex gloves for when things get bloody.

options.name: Peacock Addon (Challenge)
options.tooltip: Install the suit to your game as an addon without replacing existing suits. You will need to complete the Miami, The Finish Line assassination challenge "Tonight's The Night" to unlock the suit. This will only work if you're playing with Peacock.

english.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_: Channel your inner Dark Passenger with this henley, cargo pants and boots. Complete with stylish watch and latex gloves for when things get bloody.
english.UI_CHALLENGES_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_TONIGHT:
• Eliminate a target with a knife while wearing your suit.
  • No bodies found.

french.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_: Canalisez Le Passager noir qui sommeille en vous avec ce henley, ce pantalon cargo et ces bottes. Complétez avec une montre élégante et des gants en latex pour les moments les plus sanglants.
french.UI_CHALLENGES_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_TONIGHT: Ce Soir, C'est Le Grand Soir

• Éliminez une cible avec un couteau dans votre tenue.
  • Aucun corps trouvé.

italian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_: Sfrutta il Passeggero Oscuro che è in te con questa henley, pantaloni cargo e stivali. Completano il tutto un orologio alla moda e guanti in lattice per le situazioni più cruente.
italian.UI_CHALLENGES_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_TONIGHT:
• Elimina un bersaglio con un coltello mentre indossi il tuo abito.
  • Nessun corpo dev'essere rinvenuto.

german.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_: Mit diesem Hemd, der Cargohose und den Stiefeln kannst du deinen inneren Dunklen Passagier verkörpern. Komplett mit stylischer Uhr und Latexhandschuhen, wenn es blutig wird.
german.UI_CHALLENGES_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_TONIGHT:
• Eliminieren Sie ein Ziel mit einem Messer, während Sie Ihren Anzug tragen.
  • Verstecken Sie alle Körper.

spanish.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_: Canaliza tu Oscuro Pasajero interior con esta camiseta, pantalones cargo y botas. Se completa con un elegante reloj y guantes de látex para cuando las cosas se pongan sangrientas.
spanish.UI_CHALLENGES_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_TONIGHT:
• Elimina a un objetivo con un cuchillo con el traje puesto.
  • Que no descubran cuerpos.

russian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_: Пробудите в себе внутреннего Темного Пассажира с помощью этой хенли, штанов-карго и ботинок. В комплекте со стильными часами и латексными перчатками на случай кровавой ситуации.
russian.UI_CHALLENGES_BAY_HARBOR_BUTCHER_TONIGHT:
• Убейте цель с помощью ножа, не меняя костюм.
  • Тела не должны найти.

options.name: Peacock Addon (Unlocked)
options.tooltip: Install the suit to your game as an addon without replacing existing suits. Unlocked from the start, you won't need to complete a challenge to use it. This will only work if you're playing with Peacock.
